text:
Hi Community,
I have been browsing HubSpot on a new device(It does not have a cookie to know who I am) I notice the same options that are recommended in adding GDPR checkboxes to forms is not on HS website. Do you only have to place the cookies accept or deny on websites?

Hi Guys, one of our clients has gone into his URL redirects and deleted all system redirects. Is there any way to restore them back in?
or any way to do a bulk delete other than 10 at a time?
I want to do the developers CMS certification
Please let me know the steps to follow... The instructions and everything.. I am learning CMS tutorials from learning center..
If anyone can help me out to let me know how to do this certification please.

<https://designers.HubSpot.com/discoverykit>

take the full course <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers>

as you take the course use your sandbox portal to play around, build things. Consider trying to re-create a website you know or use on a regular basis, in your sandbox portal
random question but does anybody know of a platform that manages trial signups that integrates with HubSpot?
normally this is part of the app itself but i had a client ask me if i knew of anything 3rd party platforms that could handle it
I am looking for a HubSpot CMS template freelance developer… if anyone knows of anyone who would be looking to build out some custom templates… I have some work for them. Send me a DM here.
I would post in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> (yes it’s fine that it’s freelance work) while it’s not a heavily posted in channel usually people respond quickly, or tag people who they think would be a good fit
<@U7SL518D6> thanks so much! I actually missed that channel. I will do so in the future.

Is there a way that I can track visitors that fill a form in my site? Just like a CTA? the thing is that I'm using AdRoll and what I need is to track how many people click on my submit button on that form}
Does anyone know of a way to put a dropdown property on a form but have the values be numbers (integers) instead of text strings?
